definition: to stick/to paste/to post (e.g. on a blog)/to keep close to/to fit snugly/to subsidize/allowance (e.g. money for food or housing)/sticker/classifier for sticking plaster: strip
Spring Festival couplet (the first line of which is pasted on the right side of a doorway at New Year, and the second on the left side)
couplet (hung on each side of the door frame)
rhyming couplet/pair of lines of verse written vertically down the sides of a doorway/CL:副[fu4],幅[fu2]
We wish you long life and riches! (idiom, conventional greeting)
long-lived people, rich harvests (idiom); stable and affluent society/prosperity
usher out the old, greet the new/esp. to see in the New Year
papercutting (Chinese folk art)/to make paper cutouts
couplet (hung on the columns of a hall)
the day before New Year's Eve
